function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between demographic factors and mental health issues such as anxiety and depression.","Impact":"Higher levels of anxiety and depression among certain demographic groups.","Mitigation":"Targeted mental health support and interventions tailored to at-risk demographic groups.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for remote mental health support, AI-driven mental health screening tools.","People":"Female sex, aged 25-34 years, lower annual income, smokers, those suffering from physical multimorbidity.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Impact of home confinement and social distancing on the mental health of the general population.","Impact":"Increased risk of anxiety, depression, and PTSD due to pandemic-related restrictions.","Mitigation":"Implementation of virtual mental health services, community support programs, and access to crisis hotlines.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, online mental health resources, virtual support groups.","People":"General population affected by home confinement and social distancing measures.","Owner":"Local and national health authorities, mental health organizations, community leaders."}]}
